catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 319
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small figure seated in profile on a rock formation amid grasses; figure looking up to R at a bluff with coiling, windblown grasses; loopy inscription above that mimics the shape of grasses
inscription: at top: (Spring sea / all day, waves rise and fall, / rise and fall)
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Sea in Spring
